title: Exquisitely Hidden
description: What Happens in Vegas…?As front man for the band everyone’s eyes are on me.I bask in the spotlightBut only because it hides the flaws.Everyone has secrets.Mine will ruin everything I’ve built. My career, my music, my life…But keeping this secret?It’s breaking my heart.I knew how we would end before we startedAnd still I can’t resist him.Not everyone will understand.But I do.It’s simple.Seth Cody is everything I need when I thought I had it all. So, what happens in Vegas…?Secrets are revealed.
author: M. Jay Granberry
